summary: Adds a nice vampire female as your companion.
descriptionHtml:
The companion is mage/witch classed. She is "vanilla" so you don't need to install any other mods. Verika is shorter then most of nords in game, so she looks more girl-like and younger. She's mostly using a lightning, paralyze, vampire drain and corpse reanimation spells.

v.1-2.5

-adds Verika's armor set

-few bugs fixed

-some small changes in the new area

v.1-2
Another version of mod. What's new:

- I moved Verika to a place called "Forgotten Longhouse" on the hill. The place looks occult and it can be used as a home/hiding place for your character. (I left the old place in Falkreath with the villagers, just for fun and joy of fight :D )

-Added some new spells for her like: paralyze, lightning bolt, invisibility and magic shield.

-Fixed a dismiss bug. (She will wait in Forgotten Longhouse after dismiss.)

-she is marriageable

-Add some "servants" for Verika. They won't attack you but they are not easy to slain.

PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS AND ISSUES WITH THIS MOD!

NOTE: If Verika has got a "grey" face without a warpaint just open mod file in Creation Kit, find Verika NPC in the Object Window, then press ctrl + F4 and save it.

Planned in another versions:

- some background story
- more AI Packages
- (optional) quest

REQUIREMENTS: Dawnguard DLC

Enjoy!
author: chujec
